verses.text_plain: And after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them: and David took Metheg–ammah out of the hand of the Philistines.
verses.verse_html:
1And after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them: and David took Metheg–ammah out of the hand of the Philistines. ▼
▼ Metheg–ammah: or, the bridle of Ammah

tokens.text: this it came to pass, that David

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Metheg–ammah: or, the bridle of Ammah
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Metheg–ammah: or, the bridle of Ammah

verses.text_plain: And he smote Moab, and measured them with a line, casting them down to the ground; even with two lines measured he to put to death, and with one full line to keep alive. And so the Moabites became David’s servants, and brought gifts.
verses.verse_html: 2And he smote Moab, and measured them with a line, casting them down to the ground; even with two lines measured he to put to death, and with one full line to keep alive. And so the Moabites became David’s servants, and brought gifts.

verses.text_plain: David smote also Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, as he went to recover his border at the river Euphrates.
verses.verse_html:
3David smote also Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, as he went to recover his border at the river Euphrates. ▼
▼ Hadadezer: or, Hadarezer

verses.text_plain: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven hundred horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for an hundred chariots.
verses.verse_html:
4And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven hundred horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for an hundred chariots. ▼
▼ from…: or, of his chariots

footnotes.body_html: ▼ from…: or, of his chariots

verses.text_plain: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadadezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
verses.verse_html: 5And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadadezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.

verses.text_plain: Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus: and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought gifts. And the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.
verses.verse_html: 6Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus: and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought gifts. And the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.text_plain: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 7And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.
verses.verse_html: 8And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.

verses.text_plain: When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,
verses.verse_html: 9When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,

verses.text_plain: Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And Joram brought with him vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and vessels of brass:
verses.verse_html:
10Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And Joram brought with him vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and vessels of brass: ▼
▼ Joram: also called, Hadoram
 , ▼
▼ salute…: Heb. ask him of peace
 , ▼
▼ had wars…: Heb. was a man of wars with
 , ▼
▼ brought…: Heb. in his hand were

footnotes.body_html: ▼ Joram: also called, Hadoram

footnotes.body_text: ▼ salute…: Heb. ask him of peace
footnotes.body_html: ▼ salute…: Heb. ask him of peace

footnotes.body_text: ▼ had wars…: Heb. was a man of wars with
footnotes.body_html: ▼ had wars…: Heb. was a man of wars with

footnotes.body_text: ▼ brought…: Heb. in his hand were
footnotes.body_html: ▼ brought…: Heb. in his hand were

verses.text_plain: Which also king David did dedicate unto the Lord, with the silver and gold that he had dedicated of all nations which he subdued;
verses.verse_html: 11Which also king David did dedicate unto the Lord, with the silver and gold that he had dedicated of all nations which he subdued;

verses.text_plain: Of Syria, and of Moab, and of the children of Ammon, and of the Philistines, and of Amalek, and of the spoil of Hadadezer, son of Rehob, king of Zobah.
verses.verse_html: 12Of Syria, and of Moab, and of the children of Ammon, and of the Philistines, and of Amalek, and of the spoil of Hadadezer, son of Rehob, king of Zobah.

verses.text_plain: And David gat him a name when he returned from smiting of the Syrians in the valley of salt, being eighteen thousand men.
verses.verse_html:
13And David gat him a name when he returned from smiting of the Syrians in the valley of salt, being eighteen thousand men. ▼
▼ smiting: Heb. his smiting

footnotes.body_html: ▼ smiting: Heb. his smiting

verses.text_plain: And he put garrisons in Edom; throughout all Edom put he garrisons, and all they of Edom became David’s servants. And the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.
verses.verse_html: 14And he put garrisons in Edom; throughout all Edom put he garrisons, and all they of Edom became David’s servants. And the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.text_plain: And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.
verses.verse_html: 15And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.

verses.text_plain: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder;
verses.verse_html:
16And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder; ▼
▼ recorder: or, remembrancer, or, writer of chronicles

footnotes.body_text: ▼ recorder: or, remembrancer, or, writer of chronicles
footnotes.body_html: ▼ recorder: or, remembrancer, or, writer of chronicles

verses.text_plain: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Seraiah was the scribe;
verses.verse_html:
17And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Seraiah was the scribe; ▼
▼ scribe: or, secretary

verses.text_plain: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and David’s sons were chief rulers.
verses.verse_html:
18And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and David’s sons were chief rulers. ▼
▼ chief rulers: or, princes

footnotes.body_html: ▼ chief rulers: or, princes
